content: jen s half hour hat by jen geigley jen s half hour hat design notes the perfect hat to knit for yourself or for someone you care about this is my abbreviations personal favorite hat i have knit several of them for myself and for others and beg - beginning it s my go-to daily winter extra cozy hat the shape and fit are just right knit this bobble - bind off hat in a half hour using 100 grams of bulky yarn you can knit two hats from one co - cast on 200 gram skein it s easy to modify by adding or subtracting row in the ribbed or decrease - decrease stockinette section lickity split quick little knit happy knitting please share your k - knit hats online by using the hashtag #jenshalfhourhat i love seeing your projects k2tog - knit two stitches together sizes pm - place marker one size adult p - purl to fit 18-20 / 45 72-50 8 cm head size repeat - repeat round s - round s finished measurements rs - right side 18-20 / 45 72-50 8 cm circumference hat is stretchy 9 / 23 cm tall sl - slip st s - stitch es yarn st st - stockinette stitch wool and the gang crazy sexy wool ws - wrong side or the wool from we are knitters 100% wool 80m/87 yards = 200 gr super bulky | 4 wpi needles us 15 / 10 mm 16 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge us 15 / 10 mm dpns notions large sitch marker tapestry needle gauge 5 sts and 6 rnds/row = 2 in / 5 cm in stockinette stitch on us 15 / 10 mm needles use smaller needles for a smaller hat stitch patterns 1x1 rib all row/rnds *k1 p1 repeat from * to end stockinette stitch in the round knit all stitches this pattern is provided for your personal non-commercial use and may not be resold or shared © 2024 - jen geigley all rights reserved
